mapper.select: select p.no as no, p.title as title, k.name as kind, u.nickname as nickname, p.hit as hit, p.recommend as recommend, p.level_no as level from problem p, user u, kind k where p.user_no = u.no and p.kind_no = k.no and p.level_no = 6 and state = 'y' and end_time is null order by p.reg_date desc
